snippet: “Mission Drift,” a musical Coil Festival entry from the TEAM, is a sprawling musical epic about five centuries of American expansion and destruction.
abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews Theater of the Emerging American Movement ensemble musical Mission Drift at the Connelly Theater as part of the Coil Festival; Rachel Chavkin directs and Heather Christian stars.
lead_paragraph: “Mission Drift,” a musical Coil Festival entry from the TEAM, is a sprawling musical epic about five centuries of American expansion and destruction.

headline.seo: ‘Mission Drift,’ a Musical at the Coil Festival - Review
headline.main: The Story of America, Founding to Foreclosure (Singing and Dancing, Too)
headline.print_headline: The Story of America, Founding to Foreclosure (Singing and Dancing, Too)
